entry.name: Hit 0: Radius
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit0_Radius
Description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit1_Radius
Description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

Description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit3_Radius
Description: Radius of sphere/capsule hitbox.

entry.name: Knockback Distance
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: knockbackDist
Description: Knockback distance of attack.

entry.name: Hit Stop Time
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hitStopTime
Description: Duration of the 'hit' flag on the target.

entry.name: Target SpEffect [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId0
Description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target SpEffect [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId1
Description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target SpEffect [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId2
Description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target SpEffect [3]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId3
Description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Target SpEffect [4]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectId4
Description: Special effect applied to target on hit.

entry.name: Hit 0: Dummy Poly [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit0_DmyPoly1
Description: Damipoli in sphere, capsule position

entry.name: Hit 1: Dummy Poly [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit1_DmyPoly1
Description: Damipoli in sphere, capsule position

entry.name: Attack Correction: Blowing
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: blowingCorrection
Description: Correction value when blowing off

entry.name: Attack Correction: Physical
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkPhysCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate physical attack damage. Player-type only.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Magic
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkMagCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate magic attack damage. Player-type only.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Fire
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkFireCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate fire attack damage. Player-type only.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Lightning
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkThunCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate lightning attack damage. Player-type only.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Stamina
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkStamCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate stamina attack damage. Player-type only.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Guard Attack Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardAtkRateCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character guard attack power.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Guard Break
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardBreakCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character guard breaking power.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Throw Escape
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkThrowEscapeCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to weapon attacks during throws.

entry.name: Conditional Weapon Effect 1
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: subCategory1
Description: If this matches with any of the Conditional Weapon Effect fields in a SpEffect row, it will apply the SpEffect for that attack.

entry.name: Conditional Weapon Effect 2
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: subCategory2
Description: If this matches with any of the Conditional Weapon Effect fields in a SpEffect row, it will apply the SpEffect for that attack.

entry.name: Damage: Physical
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkPhys
Description: Absolute physical attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Magic
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkMag
Description: Absolute magic attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Fire
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkFire
Description: Absolute fire attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Lightning
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkThun
Description: Absolute lightning attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Stamina
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkStam
Description: Absolute stamina attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Guard Attack Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardAtkRate
Description: Absolute guard attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Guard Break Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardAtkRate
Description: Absolute guard breaking power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Is Considered Special Attack for Asset Destruction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isEnableCalcDamageForBushesObj
Description: Do you want to calculate damage for assets that are "Break due to bush damage"? To set. 〇: Calculate, ×: Do not calculate (that is, you cannot inflict damage)

entry.name: Damage: Throw Escape
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkThrowEscape
Description: Absolute attack power of attack during throw.

entry.name: Damage: Object
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkObj
Description: Amount of damage dealt to objects by this attack.

entry.name: Guard Cut Stamina Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardStaminaCutRate
Description: Correction applied to the stamina required to block this attack.

entry.name: Guard Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardRate
Description: Percentage correction made to the guarding ability of the attack, as set in weapon parameters or NPC parameters.

entry.name: Throw Type ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: throwTypeId
Description: Throw to trigger when attack hits. For some reason, throws are triggered using this ID, which is a field within each Throw table entry rather than the ID of the Throw table entry itself.

entry.name: Hit 0: Hit Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit0_hitType
Description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 1: Hit Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit1_hitType
Description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 2: Hit Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit2_hitType
Description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 3: Hit Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hit3_hitType
Description: Type of hit applied by hitbox.

entry.name: Hit 0: Priority
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hti0_Priority
Description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Hit 1: Priority
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hti1_Priority
Description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Hit 2: Priority
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hti2_Priority
Description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Hit 3: Priority
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hti3_Priority
Description: Priority of hitbox. If two hits occur simultaneously, only the highest priority hit occurs.

entry.name: Damage Level
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dmgLevel
Description: Impact level of attack, which determines how the target reacts to it (e.g. knocked backward, launched into the air, etc.). Certain special effects on the target (e.g. Iron Flesh) may re-map this impact level to a different one.

entry.name: Map Hit Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: mapHitType
Description: Determines how this attack interacts with the map.

entry.name: Guard Absorption Bypass Rate
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardCutCancelRate
Description: Percentage (from -100 to 100) of target's current guard rate to ignore. A value of -100 will ignore guarding completely, and a value of 100 will double their guarding effectiveness.

entry.name: Attack Attribute
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkAttribute
Description: Type of damage done by the attack.

entry.name: Effect Attribute
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spAttribute
Description: Type of special state used by the attack.

entry.name: Attack Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkType
Description: Determines the SFX and SE generated by the attack itself (before hit).

entry.name: Attack Material
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkMaterial
Description: Determines the SFX and SE generated when the attack hits.

entry.name: Guard Range Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: guardRangeType
Description: Guard judgment position

entry.name: Defence SE Material
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: defSeMaterial1
Description: Determines the SE used when guarding.

entry.name: Hit Source Type
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: hitSourceType
Description: Specify where you get the dummy poly for attack.

entry.name: Throw Flag
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: throwFlag
Description: Determines how this attack relates to throws: not at all, a throw trigger, or a throw damage parameter.

entry.name: Disable Guard
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: disableGuard
Description: If True, this attack cannot be blocked (e.g. throws).

entry.name: Disable Stamina Attack
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: disableStaminaAttack
Description: If True, this attack will deal no stamina damage, regardless of its stamina attack power.

entry.name: Disable Hit SpEffect
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: disableHitSpEffect
Description: If True, this attack will trigger no special effects on the target.

entry.name: Disable Missed Attack Notification For AI
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: IgnoreNotifyMissSwingForAI
Description: If True, the character's AI will not be informed when this attack misses. Enabled for basic body attacks (falling, rolling, ladder punches, etc.) that are generally not considered to be serious attacks.

entry.name: Repeat Hit Sound FX
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: repeatHitSfx
Description: If True, sound effects will supposedly be repeated as long as the attack continuously hits a wall.

entry.name: Is Physical Projectile
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isArrowAtk
Description: Flags if this is the attack damage parameter of a physical projectile (arrow, bolt, or throwing knife).

entry.name: Is Attack By Ghost
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isGhostAtk
Description: Flags if this is an attack of a ghost, which presumably disables wall collision, etc.

entry.name: Disable No Damage
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDisableNoDamage
Description: Ignore invincible effects such as steps, TAE's complete invincibility cannot be ignored.

entry.name: Attack Power - SFX Effect
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkPow_forSfx
Description: Attack strength [SFX]

entry.name: Attack Direction - SFX Effect
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkDir_forSfx
Description: Attack direction [SFX]

entry.name: Oppose Target
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: opposeTarget
Description: Target: ● Hostile

entry.name: Friendly Target
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: friendlyTarget
Description: Target: ○ Allies

entry.name: Self Target
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: selfTarget
Description: Target: myself

entry.name: Is Target Hit Through Door
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isCheckDoorPenetration
Description: Whether to check the door penetration. In the case of ○, it is judged whether or not the target through the door can be attacked.

entry.name: Is Versus Ride Attack
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isVsRideAtk
Description: If you hit the target of the riding special attack while riding, the SA damage will be multiplied by the multiplier.

entry.name: Is Base Attack Added
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isAddBaseAtk
Description: Do you refer to the additional attack power even in weapon attacks?

entry.name: Is Excluded from Threat Level Notification
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: excludeThreatLvNotify
Description: Is it excluded from threat level notification?

entry.name: Attack Behavior ID [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkBehaviorId
Description: Behavior identification value: Extra large damage transition

entry.name: Attack Power - SE Effect
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkPow_forSe
Description: Attack strength [SE]

entry.name: Damage: Poise
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkSuperArmor
Description: Value used for SA break calculation formula. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Decal ID [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: decalId1
Description: Decal ID 1 (directly specified)

entry.name: Decal ID [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: decalId2
Description: Decal ID 2 (directly specified)

entry.name: Appear AI Sound ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: AppearAiSoundId
Description: ID of AI sound generated when an attack occurs

entry.name: Hit AI Sound ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: HitAiSoundId
Description: ID of AI sound generated at the time of hit

entry.name: Hit Rumble ID - Default
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: HitRumbleId
Description: Vibration ID at the time of hit (-1 invalid). It is a vibration ID when none of the following three applies

entry.name: Hit Rumble ID - Normal
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: HitRumbleIdByNormal
Description: Vibration ID at the time of hit when hitting the tip (-1 invalid)

entry.name: Hit Rumble ID - Middle
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: HitRumbleIdByMiddle
Description: Vibration ID at the time of hit when hit in the middle (-1 invalid)

entry.name: Hit Rumble ID - Root
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: HitRumbleIdByRoot
Description: Vibration ID at the time of hit when hitting the root (-1 invalid)

entry.name: Trace SFX ID [0]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: traceSfxId0
Description: Sword flash SfxID_0 (-1 invalid)

ParamDef: Name: traceDmyIdHead0
Description: Sword flash root Damipoli ID_0 (-1 invalid)

entry.name: Defence SFX Material [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: defSfxMaterial1
Description: Used for SFX when guarding.

entry.name: Defence SE Material [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: defSeMaterial2
Description: Used for SE when guarding

entry.name: Defence SFX Material [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: defSfxMaterial2
Description: Used for SFX when guarding.

entry.name: Attack Correction: Holy
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkDarkCorrection
Description: Multiplier (as percentage from 0 upwards) applied to character attack power to calculate physical attack damage. Player-type only.

entry.name: Damage: Holy
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkDark
Description: Absolute holy attack power of attack. NPC-type only.

entry.name: Blank
entry.description: Is a dummy field within a boolean set

entry.name: Is Disable Parry
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDisableParry
Description: This is a flag to disable the new parry control. A process that determines that the damage on the attacking side has been parried when it comes into contact with a character in the parry state on the defending side.

entry.name: Is Disable 2H ATK Bonus
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isDisableBothHandsAtkBonus
Description: Avoid using the 1.5x growth status adaptation with both hands

entry.name: Is Invalidated by No Damage in Air
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: isInvalidatedByNoDamageInAir
Description: If "Do you want to penetrate invincibility" is ◯, this setting will be ignored.

entry.name: Damage Level - Vs. Player
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: dmgLevel_vsPlayer
Description: Damage level to the player. If it is "0 (default)", it is not used. The meaning of the range other than "0 (default)" is the same as "Damage level".

entry.name: Status Ailment Correction
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: statusAilmentAtkPowerCorrectRate
Description: Magnification correction is performed for the abnormal state attack power of special effects.

entry.name: Attack Correction - By SpEffect Point
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectAtkPowerCorrectRate_byPoint
Description: Magnification correction is performed for the special effect - attack power [point].

entry.name: Attack Correction - By SpEffect Power
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectAtkPowerCorrectRate_byRate
Description: Magnification is corrected for the special effect's attack power multiplier.

entry.name: Attack Correction - By SpEffect Damage
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spEffectAtkPowerCorrectRate_byDmg
Description: Attack side of special effect: Performs magnification correction for the damage multiplier.

entry.name: Attack Behavior ID [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkBehaviorId_2
Description: Behavior identification value: Plays damage motion only at specific times

entry.name: Throw Damage Attribute
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: throwDamageAttribute
Description: Attribute of throw damage of attack judgment. Corresponding special effects will be applied. It works only when the attack ATK_PATAM_THROWFLAG_TYPE is "2: Throw".

entry.name: Status Ailment Correction - By Point
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: statusAilmentAtkPowerCorrectRate_byPoint
Description: Magnification correction is performed for the special effect "Whether to apply the abnormal state attack power magnification correction".

entry.name: Attack Element Correct ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: overwriteAttackElementCorrectId
Description: For overwriting the ID of the parameter that corrects the attack attribute

entry.name: Decal Base ID [1]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: decalBaseId1
Description: Decal identifier 1 (3 digits)

entry.name: Decal Base ID [2]
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: decalBaseId2
Description: Decal identifier 2 (3 digits)

entry.name: Weapon HP Regain Scale
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: wepRegainHpScale
Description: Weapon regain amount correction value

entry.name: Attack HP Regain
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkRegainHp
Description: Attack regain amount

entry.name: HP Regain Time Scale
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: regainableTimeScale
Description: Regainable time correction factor

entry.name: HP Regain Rate Scale
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: regainableHpRateScale
Description: Regainable rate correction factor

entry.name: Same Attack Judgment ID
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: regainableSlotId
Description: Same attack judgment ID

entry.name: Effect Attribute VFX Variation Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: spAttributeVariationValue
Description: Value to give variation to SFX and SE generated by special attribute in combination with "special attribute"

entry.name: Parry Forward Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: parryForwardOffset
Description: Front angle offset of [collapsed side] of parry establishment condition

entry.name: Attack Correction: Poise
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: atkSuperArmorCorrection
Description: Correction value to be applied to the [basic value] set for the weapon. Player-type only.

entry.name: Defence SFX Material Variation Offset
entry.description:
ParamDef: Name: defSfxMaterialVariationValue
Description: A value to have variations of damage SFX and SE in combination with "defense material 1 or 2" used when guarding.
